Sentece: After systematic structure-activity relationship (SAR) study around benzoic acid moieties, 5 novel DPP-4 inhibitors with low picomolar potency range (IC50 < 1 nM) and excellent selectivity against various DPP-4 homologues were identified, in which the best one, compound 2f, with the IC50 value of 0.1 nM for DPP-4, showed 22-fold improvement in inhibitory activity compared to lead compound uracil 1, its activity was 45-fold more potent than alogliptin.
